participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys nature and hands-on activities.
participant_1.background: i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i just got a job working in a gas station. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Relaxed and thoughtful, appreciates the little joys in life.
participant_2.background: i love taking bubble baths. i do not drink alcohol. i like to play chess. i'm single and with two dogs. i'm in my thirties.
